content.question: According to the author, the example of Byron and Chateaubriand as writers served to

choices.label: distance them from the values of the aristocracy
call into question the need to support artistic activity
hasten the end of the Victorian era
enhance the dignity of other artists

content.answer: enhance the dignity of other artists

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
